Detailed Description

A gesture is a hand-drawn shape on a touch screen.

It can have one or multiple GestureStroke. Each stroke is a sequence of timed points. A user-defined gesture can be recognized by a GestureRecognizer.

float gaia::core::Gesture::getLength ( ) const

Calculates the total length of the gesture.

When there are multiple strokes in the gesture, this returns the sum of the lengths of all the strokes.

Returns:
the length of the gesture

int32_t  height,
int32_t  edge,
int32_t  numSample,
int32_t  color 
) const

Creates a Bitmap of the gesture with a transparent background.

This method wont scale the gesture to fit in with the Bitmap with given size.

Parameters:
widthWidth of the target bitmap.
heightHeight of the target bitmap.
edgeThe width of the inner frame.
numSampleThe number of points needed.
colorThe color of bitmap.
Returns:
The bitmap.
